```{r echo=FALSE, results="hide"}
data_train = readRDS(file = "data_train.rds")
data_test = readRDS(file = "data_test.rds")
```

Provided data is  data frames `data_train` and `data_test`.

- the train data set is composed of `r nrow(x = data_train)` observations and `r ncol(x = data_train)` variables.
- the test data set is composed of `r nrow(x = data_test)` observations and `r ncol(x = data_test)` variables.
